meanings.definition: A quadricentennial is a period of 400 years.
meanings.sent1: The town celebrated its quadricentennial with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: The country marked the quadricentennial of its independence with fireworks.
meanings.sent3: The quadricentennial of the ancient tree falling was a somber occasion.
meanings.sent4: The quadricentennial of the treaty signing felt like a distant memory.
meanings.sent5: The quadricentennial of the comet's appearance was a once-in-a-lifetime event.

meanings.sent1: We celebrated the quadricentennial of the school's founding with a special assembly.
meanings.sent2: The quadricentennial of the famous author's birth was commemorated with a new edition of their book.
meanings.sent3: The quadricentennial of the invention of the wheel was a milestone in human history.
meanings.sent4: The quadricentennial of the city's establishment was a time for reflection on its growth.
meanings.sent5: The quadricentennial of the discovery of electricity revolutionized the way we live.

meanings.definition: A quadricentennial is an event that occurs every 400 years.
meanings.sent1: The comet's return was a quadricentennial event that astronomers eagerly awaited.
meanings.sent2: The quadricentennial of the rare flower blooming was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The quadricentennial of the volcano erupting was a reminder of nature's power.
meanings.sent4: The quadricentennial of the solar eclipse was a celestial spectacle.
meanings.sent5: The quadricentennial of the planetary alignment was a cosmic phenomenon.
